attributes.review: This is the WORST APP EVER it’s super laggy, has this very ugly Orange faced guy when you open up the app, the motto is crap (make America great) , and trump is an ugly name. DO NOT RECOMMEND!!!!!

So I downloaded this app because I thought it was DoorDash, I quickly realized it was actually an app to re-elect our misogynistic, homophobic, racist, sexist, etc. President. Vote I’m out of office instead of in it thanks 
Sincerely Debrah Karen.

attributes.review: i love my president so much, and i downloaded this app to support him. only a few moments after i downloaded the app, my phone restarted itself. then it started acting super weird, closing out of all of my apps, and i couldn’t text or call anyone. after a few hours of glitching it just shut off completely and now it can’t be turned back on again. this app completely destroyed my phone, and I’m so disappointed. i wouldn’t be surprised if it got hacked by china, or maybe by the far-left liberals. now how will find a place i feel safe from all the anti-trump propaganda i see all around me? everyone on the lib apps is like “oh, he’s a racist, he responded horribly to this epidemic, he’s sexist, he’s a r*p!st, he’s holding people in internment camps where they’re sprayed with poison and separated from their families, he’s helping the rich get richer while the poor get poorer, blah blah blah.” but what about all the good he’s done for this country, like creating this app that broke my phone, or all the other amazing things he’s done that i just can’t think of right now? anyway, long story short, this app broke my phone and now i don’t have a safe place where i can worship my king.
attributes.title: broke my phone!

I got this app to learn more about trump but when I opened the app it started playing “foreigner” and started showing disturbing photos of trumpie.It made a bug on my phone like a bug literally came out of my phone I was in so much shock. It wouldn’t let me leave the app it threatened to eat my pet Llama Felipe if I left the app I was so scared. I downloaded the app while taking my pet fish “cat” on a walk but all of a sudden my fish blew up it exploded everywhere     but thank god I had my other fish “dog”
